text: Famagusta District is one of the six districts of Cyprus. Its main town is the island's most important port, Famagusta. Most of the district has been under Turkish control since the Turkish invasion of Cyprus. Famagusta District has 8 municipalities and 90 communities. The municipalities are: * Akanthou * Ayia Napa * Deryneia * Famagusta * Lefkoniko * Lysi * Paralimni * Sotira Category:Republic of Cyprus
title: Famagusta District
